TopicTitle: More suggestion than bug report… N/S/E/W markers/indicators in VAB?

Articles.Content:
Unlike KSP 1, the VAB has no door/view to the outside, so it’s harder to orient craft correctly (at least for me)…

 

ex: Sometimes it is helpful to pre-incline a rocket/probe slightly in the pro-grade (E/90°) direction to help it find its’ way to orbit, but without knowing which way is which, you have to guess, then reload VAB if guessing wrong (and this has its’ own problems which I’ll post about separately).

Adding: Updated to v0.1.1 on Thursday
The door with rocket points north. Towards the launchpad.
